programme.desc: A canine couple adjusting to parenthood with a litter of five puppies discover their owner's parents face losing their home. They leap into action to help their human friends, hatching a plan to raise the money needed by robbing banks and competing in dog shows. Comedy, starring Marcus Coloma, with the voices of Odette Annable and George Lopez(n)

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice(n)

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A fairy living in an enchanted forest tries to rescue her sister from a monstrous creature. Meanwhile, the magical kingdom is thrown into chaos by a love potion, that results in a series of unexpected romances. Animated fantasy musical, with the voices of Evan Rachel Wood, Alan Cumming and Kristin Chenoweth(n)

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town singer creates a bold alternate identity for herself, and records a music video. The song becomes an internet sensation and she soon finds her alter ego becoming a huge star - but risks losing touch with the things that matter the most to her. Drama based on the 1980s cartoon series, starring Aubrey Peeples, Stefanie Scott and Molly Ringwald(n)

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Conclusion of Francis Ford Coppola's crime drama trilogy, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach, Bridget Fonda and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: Blood Orange
programme.desc: Ageing rock star Bill receives a visit from Lucas, the ex-lover of his younger wife Isabelle, who demands she give him an inheritance he claims she has denied him. Bill invites Lucas to stay, hoping to make peace between them, but Lucas has a plan to get revenge, and manipulates the pool boy into helping him. Thriller, starring Iggy Pop and Kacey Clarke

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster

programme.title: Go With Me
programme.desc: A woman returns to the isolated logging community where she grew up, and is stalked by a former cop, who now heads up a criminal organisation in the area that operates above the law. She resolves to take a stand against him, seeking the aid of a retired logger and his sidekick. Thriller based on Castle Freeman Jr's novel, starring Julia Stiles, Anthony Hopkins, Alexander Ludwig and Ray Liotta

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV host and his producer are held hostage live on air by a man who lost everything after following their advice. Crime thriller, with George Clooney and Julia Roberts

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Premiere. Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: A man travelling through Chile in the 1970s is abducted by the secret police during the military coup that brought Pinochet to power. His girlfriend tries to find out what has happened to him, but to uncover the truth, she must join a cult posing as a charitable organisation, from which no one has ever escaped. Drama, starring Emma Watson and Daniel Bruhl

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV host and his producer are held hostage live on air by a man who lost everything after following their advice. Crime thriller, with George Clooney and Julia Roberts

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Premiere. Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: We Still Kill the Old Way
programme.desc: A former gangster returns to London after 30 years living in exile in Spain when he receives word of his brother's murder. Angered by the brutality of a new generation of criminals who have taken over his territory, he gets his old partners in crime back together to avenge his sibling and restore order to the streets. Gangster drama, starring Ian Ogilvy and Allison Doody

programme.title: Close Range
programme.desc: Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins as a former soldier forced to protect his family from corrupt cops and drug cartel thugs. With Caitlin Keats, Nick Chinlund and Tony Perez

programme.title: Deadly Sisters
programme.desc: Two sisters tire of their mother's alcoholism and a string of her abusive boyfriends, and plot to kill her. Thriller, starring Abigail Breslin, Georgie Henley and Mira Sorvino

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall

programme.title: Alive
programme.desc: A plane carrying a college rugby team smashes into a mountain in the Andes, leaving the survivors stranded in unbearably bleak conditions. As supplies dwindle, they are faced with the horrifying prospect of eating their dead to ensure they make it through the ordeal. Fact-based drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Vincent Spano and Josh Hamilton

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the other's identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bay's action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Soviet submarine commander creates an international crisis by piloting his experimental nuclear vessel, which is invisible to sonar, toward the American coast. The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: A cop returns to duty after being injured in an incident that led to the death of his partner. On his first day back, he discovers evidence of corruption among his colleagues. He soon finds himself trapped inside his own precinct and fighting for survival against crooked cops determined to keep their misdeeds a secret. Action thriller sequel, starring Jonathan Good and Roger R Cross

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the other's identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bay's action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare

programme.title: The Smuggler
programme.desc: The police intercept a suspected drugs mule they believe has swallowed condoms filled with heroin on his re-entry to his native Australia. He can only be charged after the illicit substance is ejected by his body - so he spends the next week incarcerated with the authorities keeping an eye on his every movement. Comedy drama, starring Hugo Weaving, Angus Sampson and Leigh Whannell

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: Jimmy Vickers, a rogue SAS officer specialising in interrogation techniques, sets out to take vengeance on the criminal gang that murdered his parents. However, his brutal crusade is placed in jeopardy when it becomes clear the police have teamed up with members of his old unit to stop him completing his mission. Action thriller, starring Danny Dyer, Roxanne McKee and Vincent Regan(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: A cop returns to duty after being injured in an incident that led to the death of his partner. On his first day back, he discovers evidence of corruption among his colleagues. He soon finds himself trapped inside his own precinct and fighting for survival against crooked cops determined to keep their misdeeds a secret. Action thriller sequel, starring Jonathan Good and Roger R Cross(n)

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet(n)

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: A top-secret government agency has developed a seemingly unbreakable code - only for an autistic boy to crack it in an instant. Assassins succeed in gunning down his parents, but a maverick FBI agent investigating their deaths finds the child hiding in a closet, and resolves to shield him from the hitmen on his trail. Thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alec Baldwin and Miko Hughes(n)

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox(n)

programme.title: The Man from UNCLE
programme.desc: A CIA agent is forced into an uneasy alliance with his arch-rival in the KGB at the height of the Cold War. A criminal organisation is planning to alter the balance of power by making nuclear weapons widely available, and the two spies must work together to foil the plan. Action adventure based on the 1960s TV series, starring Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer, Alicia Vikander and Hugh Grant(n)

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: A skydiving instructor tries to clear himself of responsibility for the death of a woman whose parachute failed to open. However, he later learns she is a Russian spy who faked her own demise, and now needs his help to foil an international criminal conspiracy out to steal a fortune in bullion. Action thriller, starring Charlie Sheen, Nastassja Kinski and James Gandolfini(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson(n)

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: Sandra, a former pop star who put her career on hold to have a baby, suspects her producer-husband is now having an affair with a younger rising starlet. Determined to catch him out, she decides to surprise him by driving to Los Angeles with her young son in her new Monolith, a `super-car' with advanced security features. However, a series of unfortunate events leaves Sandra locked out of the car in the middle of the desert, while her son is trapped inside, and in mortal peril. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden(n)

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientist's formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: A gangster in 1970s Boston agrees to collaborate with an FBI agent in the hope of eliminating their common enemy - the Italian Mafia. However, the arrangement soon spirals out of control as the mobster uses his insider knowledge to outwit the law and consolidate his own power. Fact-based gangster drama, starring Johnny Depp, Benedict Cumberbatch, Joel Edgerton, Dakota Johnson and Kevin Bacon(n)

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: A San Francisco socialite takes a shine to a man she meets by chance, and follows him home to a Californian coastal community. Her arrival coincides with a series of mysterious attacks on people by birds, which soon escalates as vast flocks go on the warpath. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on a Daphne du Maurier short story, starring Tippi Hedren, Rod Taylor, Suzanne Pleshette, Jessica Tandy and Veronica Cartwright

programme.title: New Jack City
programme.desc: Two maverick cops set out to topple a drugs baron who has transformed an apartment block into a seemingly impregnable fortress, but reckon without the villain's determination to stay out of jail - leading to explosive confrontations. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Ice-T, Judd Nelson, Chris Rock and Allen Payne

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: Already Tomorrow In Hong Kong
programme.desc: Premiere. Sparks fly when a toy designer visiting Hong Kong gets talking to an expat American businessman. Romantic drama starring Jamie Chung and Bryan Greenberg

programme.title: Theeb
programme.desc: A Bedouin boy living in an Ottoman province during the First World War offers to help his brother guide a British officer on a perilous journey through the desert to a secret destination. He gradually becomes more aware of the devastating events occurring in the world around him and is forced to grow up quickly. Drama, starring Jacir Eid Al-Hwietat and Jack Fox. In Arabic

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell has been working alone at an energy-generating base on the moon for three years and desperately longs to return home. After he is injured in an accident, he begins to discover the disturbing truth about the operation he is running, and is forced to question his own identity. Sci-fi drama, starring Sam Rockwell, with the voice of Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy raised in South Africa's Cape Flats gets caught up in a volatile subculture dominated by two rival gangs. Thriller, starring Brendon Daniels, Jezriel Skei and Lindiwe Matshikiza

programme.title: The Hustler
programme.desc: An arrogant pool shark challenges a renowned champion player, only to lose the match and end up broke with his confidence shattered. With the aid of a cut-throat manager, he sets about honing his skills for a rematch - but making it to the top could cost him everything. Oscar-winning drama, starring Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, George C Scott, Piper Laurie, Murray Hamilton and Myron McCormick

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: During a freezing cold winter in the frozen woods of an isolated Maine logging town, a lapse of concentration has devastating consequences for a school bus driver. Drama, starring Amy Morton, John Slattery and Louisa Krause

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: A boy develops strange powers that he cannot understand, attracting the attention of religious extremists. The boy's father is determined to keep him safe, and together they go on the run from the fanatics in the hope of finding out the true purpose of his abilities - but they attract the attention of government agents, who have their own plans for the child. Sci-fi adventure, starring Michael Shannon, Jaeden Lieberher and Kirsten Dunst

programme.title: Babel
programme.desc: An American couple visit Morocco, but when one of them is accidentally shot, an international crisis ensues. Their Mexican maid, who was left to look after the children back home, encounters difficulty recrossing the border following her son's wedding, while in Tokyo, a deaf mute girl, whose father has a connection to the man responsible for the shooting, struggles to cope with her mother's suicide. Drama, starring Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett and Gael Garcia Bernal

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Two supermarket checkout girls covering for their friends on Christmas Eve get drawn into a drugs sting and are forced to cross a dealer to save themselves. Their absent colleagues endure a disastrous night's gambling in Las Vegas, while two men forced to take part in the sting find themselves spending a festive night with a narcotics agent. Drama, starring Katie Holmes, William Fichtner and JE Freeman

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: A virus sweeps across America turning people into zombies, and the government establishes measures to capture those infected and dispose of them once the process is complete. When a teenage girl is infected, her devoted father refuses to hand her over to the authorities, and vows to defend her to the bitter end. Horror, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: An abrasive, hard-drinking reporter is reduced to working for a small-town newspaper, where he discovers a man trapped in a mine shaft. He sees a chance to revive his career, and manipulates the rescue operation to drag things out as long as possible, creating a media circus but putting the man's life in jeopardy. Billy Wilder's drama, starring Kirk Douglas and Jan Sterling

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A bored millionaire masterminds a bank robbery, only to find himself pursued by a glamorous insurance investigator determined to prove his guilt. It is not long before they get embroiled in a passionate affair - but conflicting interests mean they can never really trust one another. Crime drama, starring Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, Paul Burke and Yaphet Kotto

programme.title: The Hour of the Lynx
programme.desc: A disturbed young man committed to a psychiatric ward after murdering a couple tries to kill himself while ranting about God. A scientist aiding his treatment seeks the help of a priest in uncovering the roots of his psychosis, a process complicated by the clash of their personal ideologies. Drama, starring Sofie Grabol and Soren Malling. In Danish and Swedish

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: An obsessive surveillance expert makes the unprofessional mistake of getting personally involved in a dangerous case. Francis Ford Coppola's thriller, starring Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Robert Duvall, Allen Garfield and Harrison Ford

programme.title: Me and Kaminski
programme.desc: An ambitious art journalist journeys to the remote Alps to track down a legendary artist, whom he hopes dies soon so that he can cash in on his article. Drama, starring Daniel Bruhl, Jesper Christensen and Amira Casar

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A grizzled drifter rescues a nun from a gang of rapists and gets roped into escorting her across the Mexican desert. He gradually realises there is more to his new companion than meets the eye - and she may be hiding a surprising secret. Don Siegel's Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Shirley MacLaine, Manolo Fabregas, Alberto Morin and John Kelly

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted
programme.desc: A would-be writer in the 1960s is committed to an exclusive psychiatric ward by her parents after attempting suicide, but the move seems to cause more problems than it solves. Fact-based drama, starring Winona Ryder and an Oscar-winning Angelina Jolie alongside Clea Duvall, Brittany Murphy, Whoopi Goldberg and Vanessa Redgrave

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: An American writer and his wife arrive in a picturesque French seaside town in France, their marriage in the middle of a crisis. They form friendships with locals and fellow visitors, while trying to repair the cracks in their relationship. Drama, directed by and starring Angelina Jolie, with Brad Pitt and Melanie Laurent

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss ends up at an isolated motel, where the owner's curious relationship with his domineering mother results in murder. Alfred Hitchcock's psychological thriller, starring Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, Martin Balsam, John Gavin and John McIntire

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: A successful author finds his relief at being rescued from a near-fatal car crash is severely tempered by the discovery that his saviour is a fan with psychopathic tendencies. The situation takes a turn for the worse when she discovers he has killed off her favourite character - and sets about coercing him to do a rewrite in nightmarish fashion. Oscar-winning thriller, starring James Caan, Kathy Bates and Lauren Bacall

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: Five criminals are brought together by a police line-up, and decide to join forces to pull off one more big job. However, they discover their meeting was not a coincidence and that a mysterious crime lord has plans for them. Bryan Singer's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Kevin Spacey, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak, Stephen Baldwin, Pete Postlethwaite, Chazz Palminteri and Suzy Amis

programme.title: Honeytrap
programme.desc: A Brixton teenager's misguided attempts to attract the attention of a heartless wannabe rapper have terrible results. Drama, starring Jessica Sula, Lucien Laviscount and Ntonga Mwanza(n)

programme.title: The Panic in Needle Park
programme.desc: A drug addict and dealer living in a dangerous neighbourhood of New York meets a troubled woman recovering from a botched abortion. They begin a relationship that inevitably leads to her joining him in heroin addiction as a short supply of narcotics leads to tension on the streets. Drama, starring Al Pacino and Kitty Winn(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films(n)

programme.title: American Fable
programme.desc: When 11-year-old Gitty discovers that her beloved father is hiding a wealthy man in her family's silo in order to save their struggling farm, she is forced to choose between saving the man's life or protecting her family from the consequences of their actions. Thriller, starring Peyton Kennedy, Richard Schiff and Kip Pardue(n)

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson(n)

programme.title: The Wonders
programme.desc: The lives of a family of bee keepers living in isolation in central Italy are disturbed by the arrival of a troubled teenage boy, who has been taken on as a farmhand, and a television production crew. Against her father's wishes, Gelsomina enters the family onto a reality TV show about traditional Italian food. Drama, starring Alba Rohrwacher. In Italian(n)

A bureaucrat in a totalitarian society whose populace are kept under constant surveillance begins to question the regime he works for, and begins a secret, illegal relationship with a fellow subversive. However, their small rebellion is doomed to end in tragedy. Futuristic drama based on George Orwell's novel, starring John Hurt Richard Burton and Suzanna Hamilton(n)

programme.title: The Odd Couple
programme.desc: Fastidious divorcee Felix moves in with slovenly sports writer Oscar and proceeds to clean up his chaotically untidy apartment, leading to all manner of domestic discord. Comedy based on Neil Simon's stage play, starring Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, John Fiedler, Herb Edelman and David Sheiner(n)

programme.title: Klute
programme.desc: A private detective investigates the disappearance of a scientist in New York, but finds his only lead is a prostitute with a tenuous connection to the missing man - and his attempts to gain her help are soon hampered by shadowy figures intent on silencing her. Alan J Pakula's thriller, starring Donald Sutherland, Roy Scheider and an Oscar-winning Jane Fonda(n)

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: A Mob boss watches as his empire crumbles around him after he refuses to have his girlfriend's brother killed. A disgruntled henchman responds by heading up a breakaway criminal faction, while the boss's right-hand man tries to decide where his loyalties lie. The Coen brothers' Prohibition-era gangster thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Albert Finney, Marcia Gay Harden and John Turturro(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson(n)

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy, withdrawn teenager discovers she has paranormal powers, which she uses to protect herself from her abusive mother and classmates. When a friendly student invites her to the prom, she is determined to enjoy herself and is amazed when she is crowned queen of the ball - but joy turns to fury when her tormentors play a cruel prank. Brian De Palma's adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, with Sissy Spacek, Piper Laurie and Amy Irving(n)

programme.title: Comanche
programme.desc: A powerful Native American chief agrees to take part in peace talks with Washington after an encounter with a sympathetic scout. However, a group of renegade warriors are unwilling to surrender their arms and their actions prompt a bigoted government official to use brutal methods. Western, starring Dana Andrews, Kent Smith, Nestor Paiva and Henry Brandon(n)

programme.title: The Ladykillers
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind and his gang come up with a cunning scheme to steal a fortune, but their plan is threatened by the unsuspecting elderly landlady of the boarding house they are staying in. They decide to dispose of her, which proves easier said than done. Classic Ealing comedy, with Alec Guinness, Peter Sellers, Herbert Lom, Katie Johnson, Cecil Parker, Danny Green and Jack Warner(n)

programme.title: The Spy Who Came in from the Cold
programme.desc: A burnt-out British spy is ordered to venture undercover in East Germany. He begins by faking his resignation and subsequent alcoholic depression to dupe the enemy into trusting him, but, as he becomes further embroiled in his mission, he comes to realise that he is merely a pawn. Espionage thriller, based on John Le Carre's novel, starring Richard Burton, Claire Bloom, Oskar Werner and Peter Van Eyck(n)

programme.title: The War Wagon
programme.desc: A convict is released from prison and swears vengeance on the corrupt mining contractor who took his gold-rich land. On the way, he encounters an old enemy who reveals that the gold from the mine is about to be transported in an armoured stagecoach - and suggests they join forces to steal it. Western, starring John Wayne, Kirk Douglas, Bruce Cabot and Howard Keel(n)

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood screenwriter takes a job at a small university, planning to exploit his position as a local celebrity and do as little work as possible. His cynical outlook begins to change when he falls for a single mother working toward her degree, while a talented pupil makes him consider what he wants from his life. Romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Marisa Tomei, Allison Janney and JK Simmons(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The heroic autobots discover that a spaceship from their own planet crashed into the moon decades ago, carrying their former leader and an incredibly powerful device. They must fight to defend the human race as their enemies the decepticons plot to use this machine to rebuild their own world and destroy the Earth. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Shia LaBeouf, Josh Duhamel and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley(n)

programme.title: Goon
programme.desc: An underachieving bouncer is the black sheep of a family of doctors, until he beats an ice hockey player in a fight, and is recruited by the team. While he has little sporting prowess, his ability to beat up opposing players leads him to a successful career - and a showdown with his equally violent hero. Comedy, starring Seann William Scott, Jay Baruchel and Liev Schreiber(n)

programme.title: Red Army
programme.desc: Premiere. Documentary about the Soviet Union's ice hockey team, examining how their sporting triumphs reflected the international political situation during the Cold War era. It also tells the story of captain Slava Fetisov, who was hailed as one of the nation's greatest heroes, but came to be regarded as a despised political enemy. In English and Russian(n)

programme.title: All That Heaven Allows
programme.desc: A wealthy New England widow breaks all the taboos of her conservative social circle by falling madly in love with her younger gardener. Her friends and grown-up children are scandalised as she contemplates marrying him, leaving her with a dilemma - to either bow to convention or take a chance at being happy. Romantic drama, with Jane Wyman, Rock Hudson, Agnes Moorehead and Conrad Nagel(n)

programme.title: The Lawless Breed
programme.desc: A gunslinger newly released from prison tells the story of his eventful life to a newspaper reporter in the hope of salvaging his brutal reputation. Fact-based Western, starring Rock Hudson and Julie Adams(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
programme.desc: The 19th-century sleuth and his indefatigable sidekick Watson are transported to Second World War London, where they set out to foil a Nazi attempt to steal part of an experimental weapon. Mystery thriller, starring Basil Rathbone and Nigel Bruce(n)

programme.title: Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: Historical biopic about the life and loves of the ill-fated 16th-century monarch, whose opposition to her cousin Elizabeth I led to her downfall and execution. Starring Vanessa Redgrave, Glenda Jackson, Timothy Dalton, Patrick McGoohan, Nigel Davenport and Ian Holm(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriend's father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard. Edited for language and violence(n)

programme.title: The Other Woman
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn her boyfriend is actually married, but when she meets his wife, they quickly become friends. When they discover he has a third secret lover, they decide to join forces and teach him a lesson. Comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Leslie Mann, Kate Upton and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau(n)

programme.title: High Crimes
programme.desc: A leading attorney's idyllic life turns sour when her husband is accused by the military of slaughtering defenceless villagers in El Salvador. Her battle to prove his innocence leads to some unexpected and unsettling revelations, forcing her to question everything she knows about him. Thriller, starring Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Jim Caviezel, Adam Scott and Amanda Peet(n)

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: A man suffering a midlife crisis tries to recapture his lost youth by going back to his old haunts with two equally unhappy friends and his teenage nephew. They end up being transported back to 1986 and are tempted to give themselves the lives they always wanted - despite warnings that they must not change anything. Sci-fi comedy, starring John Cusack, Clark Duke, Craig Robinson and Rob Corddry(n)

programme.title: The Long Gray Line
programme.desc: A rebellious Irish immigrant to America does not initially fit in when he joins the army, but an instructor sees his potential as a teacher and takes him on as an assistant. He spends the next five decades at a military academy, becoming an inspirational figure to generations of soldiers through both World Wars. Fact-based drama, starring Tyrone Power and Maureen O'Hara(n)

programme.title: Rear Window
programme.desc: A photographer is left housebound and in a wheelchair after breaking his leg in an accident. He passes the time watching the comings and goings of his neighbours in the apartment block opposite and becomes convinced one of them has committed a murder. However, he has trouble persuading anyone to believe his story. Hitchcock thriller, starring James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Raymond Burr, Thelma Ritter and Judith Evelyn(n)

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
programme.desc: Four brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral and discover their father was swindled out of his farm and subsequently murdered. However, as they set about avenging his death and reclaiming his land, a crook frames them for killing the sheriff. Western, starring John Wayne, Dean Martin, Earl Holliman, Michael Anderson Jr, James Gregory, George Kennedy and Dennis Hopper(n)

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: An orphan lives in the walls of a 1930s railway station, hiding from the inspector who would send him to an orphanage. He scours the station for parts to complete a clockwork robot belonging to his father, a quest which leads him to uncover a lonely shopkeeper's mysterious past. Martin Scorsese's family adventure, starring Asa Butterfield, Chloe Grace Moretz and Ben Kingsley(n)

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: A timid farmer abandoned by his girlfriend is fascinated by a mysterious woman who rides into his frontier town. He tries to act the part of a gunslinging Wild West hero to impress her, only to find himself facing a showdown with her notorious outlaw husband. Western spoof, directed by and starring Seth MacFarlane, with Charlize Theron and Liam Neeson(n)

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: Three sleep-deprived people gather at a house haunted by evil spirits to take part in an insomnia study. It soon becomes clear they are really there to aid a scientist's investigation into the origins of fear - and from the very first night, the visitors find themselves facing their deepest and most secret terrors as they confront the unknown forces prowling the corridors. Horror remake, starring Liam Neeson, Lili Taylor, Catherine Zeta-Jones and Owen Wilson(n)

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A man tries to persuade his neighbours to help him build a memorial to his son, who was killed in the Vietnam war. Eli Wallach guest stars(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark believes he is responsible for two tragedies, and pleads with Jonathan to change history(n)

programme.title: Blessed Stranger: After Flight 111
programme.desc: A woman whose teenage daughter was lost in a plane crash in Nova Scotia hopes to find evidence that she somehow survived. A fisherman who was involved in the rescue effort retrieved the missing girl's sweater from the wreckage, and the desperate mother visits him in the hope that he can help find her. Drama, with Kate Nelligan, Hugh Thompson, Stacy Smith and Janet Kidder(n)

programme.title: A Thousand Heroes
programme.desc: Tense drama based on the real-life story of a heroic pilot forced to make a spectacular emergency landing in Iowa, and the ground staff's attempts to save all 296 people on board his aircraft. Charlton Heston, James Coburn and Richard Thomas star(n)

programme.title: The Thorn Birds

programme.title: Charms for the Easy Life
programme.desc: A self-educated freethinking woman takes in her adult daughter and grandchild, and encourages them both to follow their dreams. While the grandmother is busy with an ongoing feud with a local doctor, the two younger women overcome their distrust of men and begin to fall in love - one with a lawyer, the other with a wounded soldier. Period drama set in the 1930s, with Gena Rowlands, Mimi Rogers, Susan May Pratt and Kenneth Mitchell(n)

programme.desc: A woman is convinced that her ex-husband's new girlfriend is trying to harm their daughter when she goes to stay with her dad under the shared custody agreement. Thriller, starring Genea Charpentier, David Cubitt and Tricia Helfer(n)

programme.desc: Part one of two. Starring Richard Chamberlain and Amanda Donohoe(n)

programme.desc: In the Season 8 finale, vaccination is considered modern medicine's greatest weapon against disease but thanks to pseudo-science and public gullibility, the debate over vaccination safety rages on(c)

programme.title: Dane Cook Troublemaker
programme.desc: Comedian Dane Cook knows how to stir it up with his patented brand of observational humor, skewering aspects of modern life, from our hidden Internet selves to gender taboos and everything in between, in this exclusive comedy event

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Christmas Eve hijinks put Frank Cross (Bill Murray) in a ghostly time warp in this take-off of Charles Dickens' "A Christmas Carol." Cross, who has made the meteoric rise from the depths of the mailroom to TV network president, is a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over he'll be visited by a maniacal New York cab driver from the past, a present-day fairy who's into pratfalls and, finally, a ghoulish, seven-foot headless messenger from the future

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions

programme.title: Three Men And A Baby
programme.desc: Three handsome Manhattan bachelors find their dating and mating rituals irreparably altered when a baby, the lovechild of one of the men, shows up on their doorstep. Stars Tom Selleck, Steve Guttenberg and Ted Danson

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: For an awkward, self-conscious girl like Kiki (Julia Roberts), being the personal assistant to a beautiful megastar like Gwen (Catherine Zeta-Jones) is no bowl of cherries. But when she reluctantly accepts the task of helping Gwen and her estranged husband (John Cusack) make it through one last public appearance - masterminded by legendary press agent Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal) - Kiki finds her job satisfaction plummeting

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire

programme.title: The Yards
programme.desc: Released from prison after taking the fall for a group of his friends, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) just wants to get his life on track. But when he takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan) and reconnects with his old friend Willie (Joaquin Phoenix), Leo finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs and murder. Featuring Charlize Theron, Faye Dunaway and Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Sugar and Spice
programme.desc: Goldie's ex-husband shows up and asks her for a favor. A female fan shows her love for Eddie in an unusual fashion. When Bill takes Cassie to an exclusive party at the Riot House, she has a revelation. Adam meets his comedy idol. Cassie wrestles with what it means to be a woman in the comedy world(c)

programme.title: PART 8
programme.desc: Gotta light?(c)

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A shunned Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
programme.desc: In this buddy drama, a Vietnam vet and his grumpy yet lovable sidekick team up to find the killer of a young boxer and clean up the streets of LA only to be drawn into an international crime ring. Stars Danny Trejo and Danny Glover

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou
programme.desc: Action film series starring Danny Glover and Danny Trejo as senior heroes who visit Louisiana for a wedding escape only to encounter violence and mayhem, and once again, must pursue their own form of justice

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange in this dramatic thriller based on real events. In a quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power, an Internet startup becomes the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: Donald Sutherland and Mary Tyler Moore star as an upper-middle-class couple whose "ordinary" existence is shattered by the death of their oldest son in director Robert Redford's Oscar® winning examination of a family torn apart by tension and tragedy. Co-starring Timothy Hutton as the younger son, struggling against suicide and guilt and Judd Hirsch as the psychiatrist who provides his lifeline to survival

programme.title: L Word Mississippi: Hate The Sin
programme.desc: A provocative and moving documentary that explores the lives of gay women living in the conservative, religious deep South and the unique hardships, bigotry, bullying, sexism and racism they endure. Produced by Ilene Chaiken of 'The L Word' and 'The Real L Word'

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy

programme.title: Dangerous Minds
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer stars in this fact-based drama about a former U.S. Marine who takes on a new civilian mission: teacher at a tough inner-city high school. George Dzundza and Courtney B. Vance costar in this hit that features the smash music single "Gangster's Paradise" by Coolio

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as a professional assassin sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb where his ten-year high school reunion is also taking place. There, he must fend off federal agents, a rival assassin, and fulfill a contract to kill, all while trying to win back with his former sweetheart. Also stars Minnie Driver and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)(n)

programme.title: PART 8
programme.desc: Gotta light?(n)

programme.title: Enemy At The Gates
programme.desc: Joseph Fiennes and Jude Law star in this riveting account of the 1942-43 Battle of Stalingrad from the Russian point of view. Talented sharpshooter Vassili is a rural youth who becomes a national hero by almost single-handedly holding back the German assault. That is, until the Nazis send a gifted gunslinger of their own to the besieged city, his sole mission to assassinate Vassili(n)

credits.writer: Graphic Violence, Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me
programme.desc: In a town where nothing is as it seems - and everyone has something to hide - this prequel to the television drama series chronicles the seven days leading up to the brutal murder of Laura Palmer in a small logging town in the Pacific Northwest. Written and directed by David Lynch and starring Kyle MacLachlan, Sheryl Lee, Heather Graham, David Bowie, Chris Isaak, Harry Dean Stanton, Kiefer Sutherland and more(n)

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: Donald Sutherland and Mary Tyler Moore star as an upper-middle-class couple whose "ordinary" existence is shattered by the death of their oldest son in director Robert Redford's Oscar® winning examination of a family torn apart by tension and tragedy. Co-starring Timothy Hutton as the younger son, struggling against suicide and guilt and Judd Hirsch as the psychiatrist who provides his lifeline to survival(n)

programme.title: The Program
programme.desc: A group of young athletes come together from different worlds in this gritty, action-packed story of Top 10 college football, where talent unites them, competition divides them and their demanding coach stands by them, even when they fall. Stars James Caan and Halle Berry(n)

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe stars as an FBI agent assigned the job of doing surveillance on a senior agent whose sexual deviance may be compromising the agency. When he learns that his new boss is actually a spy, he becomes part of a massive sting operation to bring him to justice. Also starring Academy Award® winner Chris Cooper and Laura Linney(n)

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order(n)

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly(n)

programme.title: You Can Count On Me
programme.desc: This two-time Oscar® nominee stars Laura Linney as a single mom whose ordered life is disrupted by a visit from her irresponsible brother (Mark Ruffalo). They weathered tragedy together as kids but now the siblings seem to have little in common, until they begin influencing each other in subtle, subversive ways. Matthew Broderick costars in this acclaimed comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: More Than T
programme.desc: Beyond the headlines and debates about gender rights witness the multidimensional lives of seven transgender and gender nonconforming individuals as told through the lens of celebrated filmmaker Silas Howard (‘Transparent')(n)

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe stars as an FBI agent assigned the job of doing surveillance on a senior agent whose sexual deviance may be compromising the agency. When he learns that his new boss is actually a spy, he becomes part of a massive sting operation to bring him to justice. Also starring Academy Award® winner Chris Cooper and Laura Linney(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication(n)

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis

programme.title: Battle Royale
programme.desc: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students, and places them on a on a desert island where they are forced to fight each other to death or all of them will be killed

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A group of people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack

programme.title: Survival Island
programme.desc: A shipwreck at sea leaves a wealthy married couple (Billy Zane and Kelly Brook) alive with only each other and a former servant (Juan Pablo di Pace) for companionship - a situation that quickly leads to sexual jealousy and murderous intentions

programme.title: Open Water

Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis

Devon Gummersall, Derek Richardson and Tina Illman star in this tongue-in-cheek horror flick

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse for a group of friends when they visit a remote archaeological dig in the jungle and are quickly entangled in a brutal struggle for survival against the evils hidden within. Stars Jena Malone(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: When a man stumbles upon a bloody crime scene, a pickup truck loaded with heroin and two million dollars in cash, his decision to take the money and run ignites an unstoppable chain reaction of violence and mayhem in writer/director Joel and Ethan Coen's Academy Award winning thriller. Starring Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem and Josh Brolin

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley

programme.title: Tooken
programme.desc: In this spoof of the 'Taken' action-film franchise, an ex-CIA agent is now working as a mall security guard who keeps finding his things are being taken from him, including his wife, his dog and his daughter's virginity. With the help of his elderly mother, he must battle his nemesis to free his family. Stars Margaret Cho

programme.title: Phat Beach
programme.desc: When an overweight teen's parents go out of town, he and his suave buddy steal his dad's Mercedes convertible, and take a wild ride to Southern California where they find sun, fun and well-browned buns

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history(c)

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. But it's not long before history repeats itself and new sexting allegations leave Weiner and his aides scrambling to contain the damage. Featuring unfettered access to the candidate and his campaign. Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary

programme.title: The Howling Reborn
programme.desc: Will (Landon Liboiron) is a young man harboring a secret crush on pretty classmate Eliana (Lindsey Shaw) and even bigger secret about his past: he's the son of a werewolf and may have supernatural gifts of his own. When a mysterious attack reveals that a werewolf army is being assembled by someone from his past, he's torn between his true nature and his love for Eliana. This reboot of the "Howling" horror franchise costars Ivana Milicevic

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Four friends en route to a wedding on Halloween night suffer an automotive mishap that lands them squarely in the lair of zombie-creating vampire bats, while a creepy "horror host" (Tom Noonan) occasionally interrupts the action to comment on this exquisite slice of B-movie hokum. Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two ordinary inner-city kids who chase the dream of professional basketball glory. Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: High School
programme.desc: The day after valedictorian Henry Burke (Matt Bush) tries marijuana for the first time, his school principal (Michael Chiklis) institutes mandatory drug tests for all students. Henry has two options: fail and lose his college scholarship, or team up with his stoner friend Travis (Sean Marquette) to beat the system. After all, if everyone fails the drug test, then no one will be expelled, right? Adrien Brody co-stars in this pot comedy

programme.title: Jimmy Vestvood: Amerikan Hero
programme.desc: Satire about a bumbling Iranian immigrant who wins the green card lottery and moves to Los Angeles to pursue his dream of becoming an American hero and unwittingly becomes embroiled in a conspiracy to start the next world war

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: After his baby son is born, chronic underachiever Tom Reilly (Zach Braff) is suddenly forced to grow up and take a job working in his father-in-law's advertising agency after his wife Sofia (Amanda Peet) elects to leave her career as a lawyer. One little wrinkle: Sofia's seemingly perfect, wheelchair-bound ex-boyfriend (Jason Bateman) also works for the same company, and immediately sets about undermining Tom at every turn. Charles Grodin, Mia Farrow and Donal Logue costar in this comedy cult favorite

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Four friends en route to a wedding on Halloween night suffer an automotive mishap that lands them squarely in the lair of zombie-creating vampire bats, while a creepy "horror host" (Tom Noonan) occasionally interrupts the action to comment on this exquisite slice of B-movie hokum. Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.title: W. Kamau Bell: Semi-Prominent Negro
programme.desc: Comedy special featuring socio-political comedian W. Kamau Bell, who brings his characteristically biting and hilarious take on the real issues of contemporary America from gentrification to raising his family in a post-Obama nation. Morgan Spurlock directs

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Bloodworx
programme.desc: When two college friends sign up for a pharmaceutical test to make some quick cash, they find themselves in a remote hospital facility in the grips of a deadly government experiment(n)

programme.title: Anarchy Parlor
programme.desc: Horror about a mysterious nomad who works at a Lithuanian tattoo parlor where he practices a dark art form passed down through the generations, giving the visiting tourists much more than they bargained for(n)

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: The terrifying villain Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns for this third entry in the successful horror franchise, this time torturing a brain surgeon who must treat the killer's inoperable brain tumor - or die trying. Meanwhile, Jigsaw has some horror-house tricks up his bloody sleeve for Jeff (Angus Macfadyen), a grieving father whose vengeful spirit is put to the ultimate test. Shawnee Smith costars in this tense sequel(n)

programme.title: Saw IV
programme.desc: The deranged fiend Jigsaw returns from beyond the grave to plague and torment one last crime investigator who can't let go of a new mystery that presents itself while the police are examining the killer's lair. Lyriq Bent, Scott Patterson, Costas Mandylor and Donnie Wahlberg star in the fourth (but by no means final) chapter of the "Saw" series(n)

programme.title: Saw V
programme.desc: The grisly influence of the fiendish serial killer Jigsaw is felt from beyond the grave in this fifth installment of the horror franchise, which finds one of the murderer's survivors teaming up with the murderer's most promising protege. Costas Mandylor and Scott Patterson star with Tobin Bell(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer(n)

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship(n)

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell(n)

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think(n)

programme.title: Daft Punk Unchained
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the pop culture phenomenon of the mysterious music duo Daft Punk, which pulls back the masks of the Grammy award winning French musicians, who are famed for performing in robot attire that hides their faces. Includes radio interviews, rare footage and exclusive interviews with their close friends and collaborators(n)

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live from Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a special performance by one of the most influential hip hop acts of all time at the world famous Metropolis Sound Studio in London. Twenty-five years after the release of Public Enemy's most successful album Fear of a Black Planet, the rap legends Chuck D, Flavor Flav, DJ Lord and The S1W perform all of their fan favorites, interspersed with frank interview footage(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and costars in this box office smash about a divorcee (Kimberly Elise) who learns to trust and love again after a nasty break up with her arrogant and emotionally distant attorney husband, thanks to comically sage advice from her sassy grandmother Madea. Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper

programme.title: Winter Wonderlust
programme.desc: A few too many cocktails turn Marisa and Brian's blind date into an overnight stay. Foiled by an ice storm, they then get unexpectedly stuck together over a holiday weekend. With nothing else to do but get to know one another, they learn that sometimes first impressions are quite wrong

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A dissatisfied lothario embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life, but ends up learning larger lessons of life and love through relationships with two very different women

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: Donald Sutherland and Mary Tyler Moore star as an upper-middle-class couple whose "ordinary" existence is shattered by the death of their oldest son in director Robert Redford's Oscar® winning examination of a family torn apart by tension and tragedy. Co-starring Timothy Hutton as the younger son, struggling against suicide and guilt and Judd Hirsch as the psychiatrist who provides his lifeline to survival

programme.title: Ticker
programme.desc: A troubled cop whose trusted partner has just been killed must pull himself together to take down a mad-bomber terrorist in this action thriller starring Michael Madsen, Steven Seagal, Dennis Hopper, Jaime Pressly and Nas

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman

programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars as an assassin who hides out in an idyllic Italian town, performing one last hit before leaving the death trade in this elegiac thriller from director Anton Corbijn
